actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 19.

official_title: A bill relating to the treatment of Social Security under any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Declares that for the purpose of any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget, the appropriate committees of the House and the Senate shall report to their respective Houses implementing legislation to achieve a balanced budget without increasing the receipts or reducing the disbursements of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund to achieve that goal.

titles.title: A bill relating to the treatment of Social Security under any constitutional amendment requiring a balanced budget.
